item.title: A Tutorial on Non-Parametric Kernel Density Estimation
item.description: A primer on non-parametric statistics in the form of kernel density estimation. Made in collaboration with Zhen Tan

item.title: Transit Bayes
item.description: A Bayesian spatial analysis of the effect of transit access on home valuation in Minneapolis, MN
